title: UMass Chan Medical School - Worcester
cleaned_text: clinical rotations will be focused on areas where our students will gain the most: Emergency Medicine, Obstetrics and Gynecology, Surgery, and Traditional Chinese Medicine. There will be additional options depending on the strength of each hospital. Special request will also be considered if a student is more interested in a specific area of specialty. Our Chinese partners in medical education are [Tongji University School of Medicine](/china/partners/tongji_uni/) in Shanghai; [West China School of Medicine](/china/partners/west_china/), Sichuan University in Chengdu, Sichuan Province; [Peking University Health Science Center](/china/partners/peking_uni_hsc/) and [Peking Union Medical College](/china/partners/peking_union/) in Beijing.
